tickets.description: There's water leaking continuously from the pipe near the building entrance since yesterday.
The lights in Block B's parking area are not working during the night.
A few unknown people have been entering the society without gate pass or verification.
Garbage has not been picked up from the C1 tower for the past 3 days, causing foul smell.
Loud construction work is happening past 10 PM in Block D, disturbing residents.
